title: Judge Stops Probe of Parents of Transgender Teen
itunes:title: Judge Stops Probe of Parents of Transgender Teen
description:
Anthony Michael Kreis, a professor at the Georgia State University College of Law, discusses a judge temporarily stopping the Texas Governor and the state's child welfare agency from investigating the parents of a transgender teenager for child abuse for providing gender affirmative treatments.

June Grasso hosts.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
